__e: She's saying that our perfectly healthy daughter started the day sharing three kidneys and now she only has one which isn't even working... which basically means, she has none.
I HAVE TWO KIDNEYS,AND THEY SAY YOU CAN LIVE WITH ONE,SO...
That's too bad. Because our theory is that the kidney damage is caused by A, and everything else is caused by B.
His liver and kidneys went to an X5 wounded on a mission; his heart - of course, as you know - went to you...
Actually, your liver and kidneys would be suitable for dinner right away...
